definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Metric or imperial reading counter available.
The petrol pumps have gone metric, ie measure petrol in litres.
sentences.chinese: 汽油加油泵已採用公制了。

sentences.english: The company is many more producible the metric bearing of breed and imperial and conic bearing.
sentences.chinese: 公司可生產多個品種的公制軸承和英制圓錐軸承。

sentences.english: The kilometer is the biggest unit of length in the metric system.
sentences.chinese: 千米是國際公制中最長的長度單元。

sentences.english: A metric unit of area equal to10 ares.
sentences.chinese: 公制術語定義的長度單位。

sentences.english: Metric unit is a measuring unit used internationally.
sentences.chinese: 公制單位是國際通用的計量單位。

sentences.english: Selectable Metric or US Standard units as well as UTM.
sentences.chinese: 可選擇公制或美國的標準單位，以及UTM。

sentences.english: Don't just come at nine o'clock because you want to see Metric or Weezer.
sentences.chinese: 不只是在九點來是因爲你想看到公制或威瑟樂團。

sentences.english: Since when has China been using the metric system ?
sentences.chinese: 中國從什麼時候起使用公制度量衡的？

sentences.english: A metric unit of dry capacity or volume equal to100 liters.
sentences.chinese: 百升公制固體容量或體積單位，等於100升。

sentences.english: When bolt size are M27 and less, metric coarse screw threads shall be used.
sentences.chinese: 如果螺栓尺寸爲M27或以下，使用公制粗牙螺紋。

sentences.english: Thrust needle bearings type comes in metric and inch designs.
sentences.chinese: INA推力滾針軸承的型號由公制和英制的設計而來。

definition: external diameter (including thickness of the wall)
analog-to-digital/abbr. for 模擬到數字|模拟到数字
